description:
LuckyDoubler (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_4round.sol#3-149) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_4round.sol#64)

LuckyDoubler (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_4round.sol#3-149) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * multiplier) / 100,false)) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_4round.sol#62)

LuckyDoubler.rand(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_4round.sol#95-101) uses a weak PRNG: "uint256((uint256(hashVal) / factor)) % max (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_4round.sol#100)"
